description: Returns information about a saved resource, including the last time it was backed up, its Amazon Resource Name (ARN), and the Amazon Web Services service type of the saved resource.

parameters.name: ResourceArn
parameters.description: An Amazon Resource Name (ARN) that uniquely identifies a resource. The format of the ARN depends on the resource type.

nested_items.name: ResourceArn
nested_items.description: An ARN that uniquely identifies a resource. The format of the ARN depends on the resource type.

nested_items.name: ResourceType
nested_items.description: The type of Amazon Web Services resource saved as a recovery point; for example, an Amazon EBS volume or an Amazon RDS database.

nested_items.name: LastBackupTime
nested_items.description: The date and time that a resource was last backed up, in Unix format and Coordinated Universal Time (UTC). The value of LastBackupTime is accurate to milliseconds. For example, the value 1516925490.087 represents Friday, January 26, 2018 12:11:30.087 AM.

nested_items.name: ResourceName
nested_items.description: The name of the resource that belongs to the specified backup.

nested_items.name: LastBackupVaultArn
nested_items.description: The ARN (Amazon Resource Name) of the backup vault that contains the most recent backup recovery point.

nested_items.name: LastRecoveryPointArn
nested_items.description: The ARN (Amazon Resource Name) of the most recent recovery point.

nested_items.name: LatestRestoreExecutionTimeMinutes
nested_items.description: The time, in minutes, that the most recent restore job took to complete.

nested_items.name: LatestRestoreJobCreationDate
nested_items.description: The creation date of the most recent restore job.

nested_items.name: LatestRestoreRecoveryPointCreationDate
nested_items.description: The date the most recent recovery point was created.
